question: You are looking for a part-time job. Write a letter to an employment agency. In your letter:introduce yourselfexplain what sort of job you would likesay what experience and skills you have
text: I am writing this letter to express my interest in the part-time job advertisement that you have posted in the Sunday Observer newspaper last Sunday.

I am Susitha Bandara, a university student, studying Engineering at Ottawa University. Since my major subject is Computer, I am keen on working in your Computer shop on a part-time basis since it will be beneficial for my studies as well. I have prior experience in troubleshooting Computers and Laptops both Hardware and Software. Because I have my lectures from 8:30 AM to 1:00 PM everyday and I am staying in the same neighborhood which your shop is located, it is extremely convenient for me to be there in weekdays. Nevertheless, in the weekends I do not have lectures I can work in the morning session.
I would be grateful if you can offer me this chance since it helps me a lot for my studies as well. I look forward to hearing from you.
